name: O (Zoey Wilson)
description:
This is just a simple casual game. Pay what you want and I hope you have fun with it.

The game is made in unity and an in browser demo is available here.

The concept is simple, you are a ball that bounces on top of platforms. The camera pans right slowly getting faster and faster as time goes on, your goal is to stay inside the screen area for as long as you can and beat your highscore!

Please note: The linux and mac versions are untested so no there are guarantees that they will work.
